query:
SELECT 
  'highlights' as type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  MAX(created_at) as latest
FROM podcast_highlights
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'avatar_videos' as type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  MAX(created_at) as latest
FROM avatar_video_tasks;
